title: Champion-Specific Quick Cast
body:
I would really appreciate a feature which allowed me to have quick cast settings different based on the champion I'm playing.
For example, I don't like having Thresh's Q on quick cast because I like to aim it with the indicator before I use it but I like having Ezreal's Q on quick cast due to the amount I spam it. Remembering to change it every game is annoying and has lead to lots of misplays.
